Question: Solution Air B.V. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Solution Air B.V.

CES 2024

- Vivoo at Home UTI Diagnostic Test with deep learning image processing for at-home UTI diagnostic testing, awaiting FDA clearance

- Eureka Dual Washing Bot, a robot vacuum and mop combo with AI dirt detection and drainage system, available in China

- Abode Edge Camera with Wi-Fi HaLow system for over a mile of wireless range, object detection, and face recognition, available for $199

- Supernal S-A2 eVTOL, an all-electric pilot-plus-four-passenger vehicle with a range of 25 to 40 miles and max speeds of 120 mph, to be available in four years

- Milo Action Communicator, a modern voice communication platform for small groups with a range of up to 5,000 feet, hands-free and phone-free operation

- Looking Glass Go, a 6-inch digital frame with sharper and thinner screen, capable of displaying spatial photos and 3D holograms, available for $300

- Droyd Venym Electric Scooterboard, an electric scooterboard for kids 4 and up with dual motors and speed-capped at 3 mph

- Apostrophy OS, a new mobile operating system based on GrapheneOS, offering a privacy-focused alternative to Android with a $15 monthly subscription

- Clicks Technology, a case that adds a physical QWERTY keyboard to the iPhone, available for select models starting at $139

- LG CineBeam Qube, a 4K projector with 500-lumen brightness, auto screen adjustment, and 360-degree rotating handle

- Lenovo ThinkBook Plus Gen 5 Hybrid, a Windows laptop with a detachable display that turns into an Android 13 tablet, priced at around $2,000

- Belkin Auto-Tracking Stand Pro with DockKit, a MagSafe charger that doubles as a 360-degree swiveling tripod for iPhone’s camera, priced at $180
Summary_cn:
解决方案空气有限公司

CES 2024

- Vivoo在家尿路感染诊断测试，采用深度学习图像处理技术，正在等待FDA许可

- Eureka双功能洗地机器人，具备AI灰尘检测和排水系统，可在中国购买

- Abode Edge摄像头，具备Wi-Fi HaLow系统，无线范围高达一英里，支持物体检测和面部识别，售价为199美元

- Supernal S-A2 eVTOL，一款全电动机载4人加机组员的飞行器，续航里程为25至40英里，最高时速为每小时120英里，将在四年后上市

- Milo Action Communicator，一款适用于小团队的现代语音通信平台，最远通信距离可达5,000英尺，无需使用手机，可免提操作

- Looking Glass Go，一款6英寸的数字相框，拥有更清晰、更轻薄的屏幕，能够显示空间照片和3D全息影像，售价为300美元

- Droyd Venym电动滑板车，适用于4岁及以上儿童，配备双电机，速度限制为每小时3英里

- Apostrophy OS，一款基于GrapheneOS的新型移动操作系统，提供面向隐私的Android替代方案，每月订阅费用为15美元

- Clicks Technology，一款为iPhone添加物理QWERTY键盘的手机壳，适用于部分型号，售价从139美元起

- LG CineBeam Qube，一款4K投影仪，亮度为500流明，支持自动屏幕调整和360度旋转手柄

- Lenovo ThinkBook Plus Gen 5 Hybrid，一款Windows笔记本电脑，附带可拆卸显示屏，可转变为安卓13英寸平板电脑，售价约为2,000美元

- Belkin Auto-Tracking Stand Pro，一款MagSafe无线充电器，可作为iPhone相机的360度旋转三脚架使用，售价为180美元
